original: de la 'di'i gling gzhi phun sum tshogs pa'i rnam par bshad pa dang / rtog pa mngon du gtong ba'i nyan pa po rnams khas len pa'i yan lag rnams ni bsdus pa'i don du bshad pas de las dpags te shes par bya'o //
analyzed: de la 'di'i gling gzhi phun sum tshogs pa'i rnam par bshad pa dang / rtog pa mngon du gtong ba'i nyan pa po rnams khas len pa'i yan lag rnams ni bsdus pa'i don du bshad pas de las dpags te shes par bya'o //
translated: The Subsequent Tantra, the domain of the holy, was taught by the holy Vajradhara for the sake of the best of the best, and I have composed this commentary on the Compendium of Principles Tantra, the Perfect Knowledge, in accordance with my ability.

translated: Moreover, first of all, the meaning which the Bodhisattvas who possess the special method have realized is clearly taught.

analyzed: de rnams kyi bye brag gi tshig byams pa la sogs pa zhes pas ni thugs su chud pa'i gang zag ston to //
translated: The words “Maitreya, etc.” indicate the persons who have realized it.

original: ci 'dra ba zhe na /
analyzed: ci 'dra ba zhe na /
translated: What kind of persons?

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bya ba smos so //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bya ba smos so //
translated: “Bodhisattva-mahāsattva” is stated.

original: thabs gang gis she na /
analyzed: thabs gang gis she na /
translated: By what method?

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dbang bskur ba thob pas sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi gsang ba bstan pa la zhes bya ba smos so //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dbang bskur ba thob pas sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi gsang ba bstan pa la zhes bya ba smos so //
translated: “Having obtained the consecration of all the Tathāgatas, in the teaching of the secret of body, speech, and mind” is stated.

original: dngos po gang gis she na //
analyzed: dngos po gang gis she na //
translated: By what things?

original: dngos po thams cad kyis zhes so ;
analyzed: dngos po thams cad kyis zhes so ;
translated: “By all things” is stated.

original: / ji ltar chud ce na //
analyzed: / ji ltar chud ce na //

original: ji lta ba dang dam tshig ji lta ba bzhin du mthong zhing thos te rtogs nas zhes so //
analyzed: ji lta ba dang dam tshig ji lta ba bzhin du mthong zhing thos te rtogs nas zhes so //
translated: “Having seen, heard, and understood the way things are and the way the commitments are” is stated.

original: gang la gsol zhe na /
analyzed: gang la gsol zhe na /
translated: To whom is it requested?

original: de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad la zhes so //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad la zhes so //
translated: To all those Tathagatas.

original: ci 'dra ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa yin zhe na /
analyzed: ci 'dra ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa yin zhe na /
translated: What kind of Tathagatas?

original: chos gzigs pa dang ldan pa zhes bya ba smos so //
analyzed: chos gzigs pa dang ldan pa zhes bya ba smos so //
translated: It says endowed with the vision of Dharma.

original: ji ltar gsol zhe na /
analyzed: ji ltar gsol zhe na /
translated: How did they supplicate?

original: ae ma'o zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
analyzed: ae ma'o zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
translated: It says Emaho! and so forth.

original: da ni yan lag gi don rnam par bshad par bya ste /
analyzed: da ni yan lag gi don rnam par bshad par bya ste /
translated: Now, the subsidiary meaning should be explained.

original: de la de nas zhes bya ba ni rtsa ba'i rgyud dang rgyud phyi ma'i mtshams 'brel zhing mjug bsdu ba dang / rgyan yin par blta'o //
analyzed: de la de nas zhes bya ba ni rtsa ba'i rgyud dang rgyud phyi ma'i mtshams 'brel zhing mjug bsdu ba dang / rgyan yin par blta'o //
translated: There, then connects the root tantra with the later tantra, and is to be seen as the conclusion and ornament.

original: byams pa la sogs pa zhes pa ni rdo rje 'dzin pa'i mthus yongs su dag pa'i zhing gi rdul dang mnyam pa rnams so //
analyzed: byams pa la sogs pa zhes pa ni rdo rje 'dzin pa'i mthus yongs su dag pa'i zhing gi rdul dang mnyam pa rnams so //
translated: Maitreya and so forth refers to those equal to the atoms of the pure realm by the power of the Vajra Holder.

original: byang chub ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa'i snying rje dang shes rab dbyer med pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo ste /
analyzed: byang chub ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa'i snying rje dang shes rab dbyer med pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo ste /
translated: Enlightenment is the maṇḍala wheel of indivisible compassion and wisdom fully enlightened into omniscience.

original: de thob par bya ba'i phyir 'dun pa ni sems pa'o //
analyzed: de thob par bya ba'i phyir 'dun pa ni sems pa'o //
translated: Aspiration for the sake of attaining that is intention.

original: kha na ma tho ba las ring du song ba 'ga' zhig la yod do zhe na /
analyzed: kha na ma tho ba las ring du song ba 'ga' zhig la yod do zhe na /
translated: Some may say, It exists for some who have gone far from wrongdoing.

original: de'i phyir sems dpa' chen po zhes bya ba smos te /
analyzed: de'i phyir sems dpa' chen po zhes bya ba smos te /
translated: Therefore, it is called great being.

original: sems can tshad ma chad pa'i rigs rnams kyi don la dmigs par byed pas nas de skad ces brjod do //
analyzed: sems can tshad ma chad pa'i rigs rnams kyi don la dmigs par byed pas nas de skad ces brjod do //
translated: It is so called because it is directed toward the aim of an immeasurable class of sentient beings.

original: so so'i skye bo 'ga' zhig las dgar ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpas khyad par du byas so ;
analyzed: so so'i skye bo 'ga' zhig las dgar ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpas khyad par du byas so ;
translated: It is distinguished by the word bodhisattva in order to distinguish it from the virtue of ordinary beings.

original: / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dbang thob pas zhes pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad las byung ba'i dbang ni byang chub kyi sems so //
analyzed: / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dbang thob pas zhes pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad las byung ba'i dbang ni byang chub kyi sems so //
translated: Having obtained the consecration of all the Tathagatas means that the consecration of all the Tathagatas is the Thought of Enlightenment.

original: des bskur ba'i nyan pa'i skal ba dang ldan par byas nas gnas pa ni dbang thob pa ste /
analyzed: des bskur ba'i nyan pa'i skal ba dang ldan par byas nas gnas pa ni dbang thob pa ste /
translated: Having been consecrated by that, and having become fit for listening, he abides in the consecration.

original: 'dod chags las byung ba'i ting nge 'dzin @181a * //
analyzed: 'dod chags las byung ba'i ting nge 'dzin @181a * //
translated: The consecration of all the Tathagatas is the consecration of the Thought of Enlightenment. 🔽Having obtained the consecration of that, and having become fit for listening, he abides in the consecration.

original: gnyis kyis yang dag par bsdus pa'i chos ji snyed pa thams cad la de skad ces brjod do //
analyzed: gnyis kyis yang dag par bsdus pa'i chos ji snyed pa thams cad la de skad ces brjod do //
translated: The consecration of all the Tathagatas is the consecration of the Thought of Enlightenment.

original: sku gsung thugs kyi gsang ba bstan pa la zhes pa ni des dag pa la sku gsung thugs kyi gsang ba'i rang bzhin yi ge dang / phyag rgya dang / ting nge 'dzin la sogs pa rdo rje 'dzin pa chen pos bstan pa /
analyzed: sku gsung thugs kyi gsang ba bstan pa la zhes pa ni des dag pa la sku gsung thugs kyi gsang ba'i rang bzhin yi ge dang / phyag rgya dang / ting nge 'dzin la sogs pa rdo rje 'dzin pa chen pos bstan pa /
translated: The teaching of the secret of body, speech, and mind is the teaching by the Great Vajradhara of the nature of the secret of body, speech, and mind, which is the syllables, the seals, the meditative stabilizations, and so forth, in the purities.

original: lhag mas bsdus pa'i chos rnams la de skad ces bya'o //
analyzed: lhag mas bsdus pa'i chos rnams la de skad ces bya'o //
translated: The phenomena included in the remainder are called that.

original: dngos po thams cad kyi zhes pa ni rang rang gi lus la sogs pa rtse gcig pas zhes so //
analyzed: dngos po thams cad kyi zhes pa ni rang rang gi lus la sogs pa rtse gcig pas zhes so //
translated: The single-pointed is with regard to one's own body and so forth.

original: ji lta ba dang zhes pa ni des rang bzhin du gnas pa'i lha 'am bdag nyid du lus la sogs pa ji lta ba bzhin du rtogs pa ste ;
analyzed: ji lta ba dang zhes pa ni des rang bzhin du gnas pa'i lha 'am bdag nyid du lus la sogs pa ji lta ba bzhin du rtogs pa ste ;
translated: The just as it is is the realization of the deity abiding in nature, or of the body and so forth just as they are, by that.

original: ji ltar zhe na /
analyzed: ji ltar zhe na /
translated: How is it?

original: dam tshig ji lta ba bzhin du zhes te /
analyzed: dam tshig ji lta ba bzhin du zhes te /
translated: It is just as the commitments,

original: sgro ma btags skur pa ma btab pas ji lta ba'i don las mi 'da' ba'i gzhung le'u dang po la sogs pa'i rim pa bzhin du shes so //
analyzed: sgro ma btags skur pa ma btab pas ji lta ba'i don las mi 'da' ba'i gzhung le'u dang po la sogs pa'i rim pa bzhin du shes so //
translated: because one does not transgress the meaning of the just as it is by not exaggerating or denigrating. One should understand it according to the text, the chapters and so forth in order.

original: mthong ba ni skus so //
analyzed: mthong ba ni skus so //
translated: The seeing is by the body.

original: thos pa ni gsung gis so //
analyzed: thos pa ni gsung gis so //
translated: The hearing is by the speech.

original: rtogs pa ni thugs kyis so //
analyzed: rtogs pa ni thugs kyis so //
translated: Realization is by the mind.

original: so so yang dag par rig pa mar dang mar 'dres pa ltar dbyer med pa la de skad ces bya ste /
analyzed: so so yang dag par rig pa mar dang mar 'dres pa ltar dbyer med pa la de skad ces bya ste /
translated: The analytical knowledges are said to be inseparable like butter and the oil that makes it,

original: 'di skad ces gsol to zhes pa dang sbyor ro //
analyzed: 'di skad ces gsol to zhes pa dang sbyor ro //
translated: and this is connected with the phrase “he said.🔽”

original: gang la gsol zhe na /
analyzed: gang la gsol zhe na /
translated: To whom was it said?

original: chos gzigs pa dang ldan pa zhes pa ste /
analyzed: chos gzigs pa dang ldan pa zhes pa ste /
translated: To the one endowed with the vision of phenomena.

original: gang gi phyir rdo rje 'dzin pa'i mthu las de rnams shin tu zab par gyur pa de'i phyir de dang lhan cig tu dus gang gi tshe na des gzigs pa de'i tshe chos gzigs pa dang ldan pa zhes bya'o //
analyzed: gang gi phyir rdo rje 'dzin pa'i mthu las de rnams shin tu zab par gyur pa de'i phyir de dang lhan cig tu dus gang gi tshe na des gzigs pa de'i tshe chos gzigs pa dang ldan pa zhes bya'o //
translated: Because of the power of the vajra holder, they become very profound. Therefore, when he sees them together at any time, he is said to be endowed with the vision of phenomena.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ces pa ni gzugs la sogs pa'i rang bzhin rtag pa la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ces pa ni gzugs la sogs pa'i rang bzhin rtag pa la sogs pa ste /
translated: All tathāgatas refers to the nature of form and so on, which is permanent and so forth.

original: dang po'i mgon po ltar bzhud par byed ba'i phyir de skad ces bya'o //
analyzed: dang po'i mgon po ltar bzhud par byed ba'i phyir de skad ces bya'o //
translated: Because they proceed like the primordial lord, they are called that.

original: ae ma ho zhes pa ni ngo mtshar ba ste /
analyzed: ae ma ho zhes pa ni ngo mtshar ba ste /
translated: Emaho means “amazing.”

original: gang la zhe na /
analyzed: gang la zhe na /
translated: To whom?

original: kun du bzang po'i zhes te /
analyzed: kun du bzang po'i zhes te /
translated: To Samantabhadra.

original: rgyu ba dang mi rgyu ba'i chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin du gnas pa'i kun du bzang po ni rdo rje 'dzin no //
analyzed: rgyu ba dang mi rgyu ba'i chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin du gnas pa'i kun du bzang po ni rdo rje 'dzin no //
translated: The nature of all things, moving and unmoving, is the universal good, which is the vajra holder.

original: de'i sku gsung thugs kyi nges pa de ngo mtshar zhes so //
analyzed: de'i sku gsung thugs kyi nges pa de ngo mtshar zhes so //
translated: His nature of body, speech, and mind is the wonder.

original: nges pa dngos gang zhe na /🔽rdo rje gsum la kun du ni //
analyzed: nges pa dngos gang zhe na / rdo rje gsum la kun du ni //
translated: What is the nature?🔽The universal good is in the three vajras,

original: rdo rje gsum ni rnam bzhugs te ;🔽/ zhes pa ste /
analyzed: rdo rje gsum ni rnam bzhugs te ; / zhes pa ste /
translated: and the three vajras are present in the universal good.

original: sems can rnams kyi sku la sogs pa'i rdo rje rnams la kun du bzang po'i sku la sogs pa'i rdo rje rnams don dam pa 'am kun rdzob tu gcig pa'am /
analyzed: sems can rnams kyi sku la sogs pa'i rdo rje rnams la kun du bzang po'i sku la sogs pa'i rdo rje rnams don dam pa 'am kun rdzob tu gcig pa'am /
translated: The vajras of the body, etc. , of all sentient beings are the vajras of the body, etc. , of the universal good, either ultimately or conventionally, and they are inseparable, either in order or not, respectively.

original: go rims bzhin du dbyer med par gnas pa la de skad ces bya'o //
analyzed: go rims bzhin du dbyer med par gnas pa la de skad ces bya'o //
translated: That is what is meant.

original: de bas na bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang @181b mdzad khams gsum pa thams cad kyi zhes bya ba la sogs pa le'u bcu bdun pa'i 'das ma thag pa'i don bstan pa yin no //
analyzed: de bas na bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang @181b mdzad khams gsum pa thams cad kyi zhes bya ba la sogs pa le'u bcu bdun pa'i 'das ma thag pa'i don bstan pa yin no //
translated: Therefore, the Blessed One, Vairochana, in all three realms, etc. , teaches the meaning of the immediately preceding chapter.

original: de ltar rdo rje 'dzin pa dang sems can rnams dbyer med par bstan nas /
analyzed: de ltar rdo rje 'dzin pa dang sems can rnams dbyer med par bstan nas /
translated: Having thus taught that the vajra holder and sentient beings are inseparable,

original: da ni don dam par na de dag kyang sangs rgyas yin par bstan pa /
analyzed: da ni don dam par na de dag kyang sangs rgyas yin par bstan pa /
translated: now, in order to teach that ultimately they are also buddhas,

original: sems can dus gsum du byung ba thams cad rdo rje'i ngo bo nyid ces te /
analyzed: sems can dus gsum du byung ba thams cad rdo rje'i ngo bo nyid ces te /
translated: it is said that all sentient beings of the three times are the essence of the vajra.

original: 'das pa la sogs pa'i sems can thams cad kyang 'das pa la sogs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi snying po dang ldan par gyur pas de rnams kyi ngo bo nyid las byung ba ste /
analyzed: 'das pa la sogs pa'i sems can thams cad kyang 'das pa la sogs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi snying po dang ldan par gyur pas de rnams kyi ngo bo nyid las byung ba ste /
translated: All sentient beings of the past, etc., are endowed with the essence of the tathāgatas of the past, etc., and so arise from their essence.

original: de'i phyir de rnams kyang /
analyzed: de'i phyir de rnams kyang /
translated: Therefore, they also

original: byang chub rdo rje gnas thob pa //
analyzed: byang chub rdo rje gnas thob pa //
translated: attain the state of vajra awakening.

original: sangs rgyas rdo rje rdzu 'phrul che //
analyzed: sangs rgyas rdo rje rdzu 'phrul che //
translated: The buddhas are the great magic of the vajra.

original: zhes te / gdod ma nas de lta bu'i rang bzhin du gnas pa la de skad ces brjod do //
analyzed: zhes te / gdod ma nas de lta bu'i rang bzhin du gnas pa la de skad ces brjod do //
translated: Since they abide primordially in such a nature, it is said that they are like that.

original: da ni de lta bu'i don de la ngo mtshar bar gsungs pa /
analyzed: da ni de lta bu'i don de la ngo mtshar bar gsungs pa /
translated: Now, in order to teach the wonder of such a meaning,

original: ae ma ho zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: ae ma ho zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: it is said, “Amazing! Amazing!” and so on.

original: 'di rab tu ngo mtshar che zhes pa ni rab tu yang ngo mtshar che zhes so //
analyzed: 'di rab tu ngo mtshar che zhes pa ni rab tu yang ngo mtshar che zhes so //
translated: This is extremely amazing means it is extremely amazing.

original: ji lta bu zhe na /
analyzed: ji lta bu zhe na /
translated: What is it like?

original: dbang po las 'das shing zhes pa ni de rnams kyi spyod yul las 'das pa'i phyir zhi ba ste spros pa dang bral ba'o //
analyzed: dbang po las 'das shing zhes pa ni de rnams kyi spyod yul las 'das pa'i phyir zhi ba ste spros pa dang bral ba'o //
translated: It is peace, free from elaborations, because it is beyond the sphere of those sense faculties.

original: de bas 'khod pa dag gi rgyun //
analyzed: de bas 'khod pa dag gi rgyun //
translated: The continuum of cyclic existence

original: mchog tu mya ngan 'das shes te //
analyzed: mchog tu mya ngan 'das shes te //
translated: is known as supreme nirvana.

original: bdag dang bdag gi la sogs par snang ba'i 'khor ba'i rgyun kho na la /

analyzed: tshig dang / yi ge dang / don sbas pa gsum du bshad pa'i phyir ro //

analyzed: de nyid 'gro ba rnams kyis rtogs par bya ba'i don du zhes so //

analyzed: yang dag gsung ba zhes bshad do //

analyzed: zhes pa ni mtshan gyi don zhus pa'o //

analyzed: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rnams rdo rje 'dzin pa chen po la dmigs pa bstan pa'i phyir /

analyzed: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o ;

analyzed: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //

analyzed: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //

analyzed: ji skad du /

analyzed: da yi de nyid dam pa ni //

analyzed: zhes so // ji ltar na ni 'dus zhes bgyi //

analyzed: sangs rgyas thams cad ces bya ba //

original: tshogs par 'dus par gsungs pa'o //
analyzed: tshogs par 'dus par gsungs pa'o //

analyzed: zhes te / rang bzhin gyi sangs rgyas dang las kyis bsgrubs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams don dam pa dang kun rdzob kyi tshul du tshogs pa'i phyir 'dus pa zhes bshad de /

original: bsdus pa'i don blta bar bya'o //
analyzed: bsdus pa'i don blta bar bya'o //

original: rgyud kyi 'brel pa ji ltar lags //
analyzed: rgyud kyi 'brel pa ji ltar lags //

original: zhes pa'i lan bstan pa'i phyir /
analyzed: zhes pa'i lan bstan pa'i phyir /
translated: In order to teach the answer to that,

original: lnga pa zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: lnga pa zhes pa la sogs pa'o //

original: de la le'u lnga @183b pa las sgrub pa po'i sngon dang phyis spyod pa'i khyad par bstan to //
analyzed: de la le'u lnga @183b pa las sgrub pa po'i sngon dang phyis spyod pa'i khyad par bstan to //

original: dgu pa las ni srog gcod pa la sogs pa'i srung ba'i dam tshig bzhi bstan to //
analyzed: dgu pa las ni srog gcod pa la sogs pa'i srung ba'i dam tshig bzhi bstan to //

analyzed: bcu bdun pa las ni 'jig rten pa dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i bsrung ba dang bza' ba'i dam tshig rgyas par bstan to //

original: bcu gsum pa las ni gsang sngags bzlas brjod kyi sbyor ba ston to //
analyzed: bcu gsum pa las ni gsang sngags bzlas brjod kyi sbyor ba ston to //
translated: The thirteenth chapter teaches the application of mantra recitation.

original: le'u lnga pa la sgrub pa po dang / gzhan gyi tshig la sogs pa 'brel to //
analyzed: le'u lnga pa la sgrub pa po dang / gzhan gyi tshig la sogs pa 'brel to //
translated: Chapter five is connected with the practitioner and the words of others, etc.

analyzed: de rnams kyang sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams sgrub pa chen por bstan pa yin zhes te /

original: mchog gi dngos grub kyi rgyu'o zhes gsungs so //
analyzed: mchog gi dngos grub kyi rgyu'o zhes gsungs so //

analyzed: bzhi pa las ni ri mo'i dkyil 'khor gsungs te /

original: slob dpon gyi las so //
analyzed: slob dpon gyi las so //

original: gnyi ga dang 'brel to //
analyzed: gnyi ga dang 'brel to //

analyzed: brgyad pa las ni de bzhin nyid dang rjes su 'brel ba'i mchod pa spro ba ste sdom pa'o //

analyzed: bcu gnyis pa las ni thun mong gi dngos grub mi snang ba la sogs pa ston to //

original: lnga pa'i don kho na dang 'brel to //
analyzed: lnga pa'i don kho na dang 'brel to //

analyzed: brgyang ba zhes pa ni gong du brgyang pa smos pas 'di gzhung lhag pas drug par 'dod de /

analyzed: drug pa de las rjes su chags pa'i sngags dang / nye bar sgrub pa rdo rje gsum byin gyis brlabs pa'i cho ga ston to //

original: ji skad du gnyis pa las /
analyzed: ji skad du gnyis pa las /

analyzed: gnyis pa las spyi dang rigs so so'i byang chub sems te sdom pa'o //

analyzed: bcu pa dang bcu bzhi pa las thugs bskul ba dang / phur bus gdab pa'i drag shul gyi sbyor ba ston te /

analyzed: bar ma'i gnyis pa kho na dang 'brel to //

original: bdun pa las rjes su dran pa bcu drug ste sgrub pa'i sdom pa'o //
analyzed: bdun pa las rjes su dran pa bcu drug ste sgrub pa'i sdom pa'o //

original: gcig pa las lha rnams phyung ba spyi dang khyad par gyi phrin las mdzad pa ste /
analyzed: gcig pa las lha rnams phyung ba spyi dang khyad par gyi phrin las mdzad pa ste /

analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi las so //

analyzed: bcu gcig pa las ri bo la sogs pa'i gnas te dngos grub kyi zhing ngo //

analyzed: bco lnga pa las rmi lam gyi bye brag gnyis te mtshan ma'o //
translated: The fifteenth [chapter] is the two kinds of dreams, the signs.

original: de ni sgrub pa po kho na dang 'brel to //
analyzed: de ni sgrub pa po kho na dang 'brel to //

original: de rnams ni mtshon pa tsam du zad de /
analyzed: de rnams ni mtshon pa tsam du zad de /

original: gzhan yang @184a * //
analyzed: gzhan yang @184a * //

analyzed: dul dang zhes pa la sogs pa'o //

analyzed: dul ba ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams so //

analyzed: gdul dka' ni gcer bu pa la sogs pa'o //

analyzed: gdul bar dka' ba tshar gcad pa dang / gzhan dag la phan gdags pa'o //

analyzed: de yang phan gdags pa ni slob dpon dang 'brel to //
translated: And that is related to the master.

analyzed: tshar gcad pa dang / phan gdags pa'i bya ba gnyis ka dang sgrub pa po 'brel to //

original: de ni bsdus pa'i don las dpags te shes par bya'o //
analyzed: de ni bsdus pa'i don las dpags te shes par bya'o //

analyzed: da ni chos dang gzhung 'brel bar gsungs pa /

analyzed: bskyed pa'i zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: The generation stage and so on.

analyzed: de la bskyed pa'i rim pa ni bsnyen pa dang / rdo rje cho ga bzhi ste /
translated: Therein, the generation stage is the four vajra rites of the approach.

analyzed: dang po'i cho ga dang / mtshan ma'i cho ga dang / sku'i cho ga'o //

analyzed: gzhan ni 'di las 'og nas ston te der shes par bya'o //

original: de lta bu dang gzhung zhes so //
analyzed: de lta bu dang gzhung zhes so //

analyzed: de bzhin du gzhung 'di dngos grub thun mong dang 'brel to //

analyzed: de bzhin du dkyil 'khor de gzhung bzhi pa dang bcu drug par 'brel /

analyzed: bla ma rnams kyi sngags lam gyis slob ma rnams la yongs su smin par byed pa dang yang gzhung 'di 'brel to //

original: de dngos gang yin zhe na /
analyzed: de dngos gang yin zhe na /

analyzed: shin tu dbang bskur ba'i brtul zhugs zhes pa ni shes rab ye shes kyi dbang bskur ba ste /

analyzed: des de nyid rtogs par byed pas de thob pa ni slob ma bzang po bdag nyid che'o //

analyzed: de thams cad kyang de dang / de las ci rigs par ston pas bsdus pa'i don la dpags te shes par bya'o //

analyzed: zhes pa'i lan bstan pa'i phyir thabs dang / shes rab ces pa la sogs pa'o //

analyzed: zhes te / kun rdzob tu sa'i cha bskyed pa la sogs pa thams cad kyi ngo bo ji snyed pa thams cad gzhi'o //

analyzed: rang bzhin med pa'i rnam pa ste /

analyzed: de las yang lnga ste /
